call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - LATE NIGHT AMA - HAPPY HOLIDAYS!

decisions.decision: 2026 Ergo meetup will be in Ithaca with a conference format
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Discussion of where to hold the 2026 Ergo meetup
decisions.quote: No, no, we're going to Ithaca 2026. I got it. We're going to do a big, we're going to do a big thing. We're going to, we got an auditorium. We're going to do a conference. We're going to invite other people, try to invite the Cornell blockchain club.

commitments.commitment: Share Dexy slides in Telegram channel
commitments.quote: I might share the Dexy slides in the Telegram channel.

commitments.commitment: Launch Gluon Dollar after updating contract
commitments.quote: I'm trying to launch Gluon Dollar... there's like things I have to update in the contract

commitments.commitment: Update Gluon Gold to change reserve ratio and equations
commitments.quote: I'm also supposed to update Gluon Gold. Because... Yeah, we wanted to change the reserve ratio, so it's closer to 1. Like, is it 1.01?

open_questions.question: Whether there's a mistake in Oracle fees implementation in Gluon Dollar contract
open_questions.context: AI audit found potential issue that needs verification

open_questions.question: What will people be using Ergo for on a daily basis if successful in three years?
open_questions.context: Question from audience about future use cases

key_facts.fact: USDT has frozen 1.8% of total supply historically
key_facts.speaker: armeanio

key_facts.fact: Luca was in India for only two days instead of planned two weeks due to culture shock and travel agency issues
key_facts.speaker: Luca
